entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the subject of Harry's concern and encouragement. He is described as someone who needs to 'pull himself together' and play at his best.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who comes up with a plan to help Ron have a good day. He is described as someone who is excited and optimistic.

entities.name: lavender
entities.description: Lavender is a Gryffindor student who tries to cheer up Ron and encourage him to do well.

relationships.description: Harry encourages Ron to have a good day and play at his best.
Lavender tries to cheer up Ron and encourage him to do well.
